font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 裂口, 分歧，意见、利益或忠诚上的明显差异： a pronounced difference of opinion, interests, or loyalty.
【例】This industry is in transition, straddling['stræd(ə)l]跨越 the chasm between enterprise business and the art of games.
【近】 contradiction, dissent, disjunction, discord, conflict, rift, rivalry, dichotomy
